title: Replace custom contact form with embedded Google Forms

requirements.summary: Replace the ContactForm component implementation with an embedded Google Forms iframe that includes fields for name, phone, email, jurisdiction (dropdown with options: Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, Cyberabad), practice area (dropdown with options: Family Law, Corporate Law, Criminal Defense, Civil Law, Property Law), and message
acceptanceCriteria: ContactForm.tsx component renders a Google Forms iframe instead of custom form elements
The embedded Google Form contains all original fields: name, phone, email, jurisdiction, practice area, and message
The iframe is responsive and maintains consistent styling with the rest of the site
Form submissions go directly to Google Forms instead of the backend canister

file_operations.description: Replace the custom form validation and submission logic with a Google Forms iframe embed. Remove all form input fields, validation hooks, and backend mutation calls. Add a Google Forms iframe that uses a configurable URL prop (defaulting to a placeholder). Style the iframe to be responsive (100% width, minimum height of 600px) and maintain visual consistency with the luxury legal theme using the existing navy and gold color scheme. The iframe should have a title attribute for accessibility and include appropriate border styling to match the site design.

requirements.summary: Update the ContactPage to display the Google Forms embedded form with appropriate styling and layout that matches the luxury legal theme
acceptanceCriteria: ContactPage.tsx renders the updated ContactForm component with Google Forms embed
The embedded form maintains visual consistency with the deep navy and gold color scheme
Contact information cards remain visible alongside the Google Form

file_operations.description: Update the ContactPage to pass a googleFormsUrl prop to the ContactForm component. Use a placeholder URL like 'https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/YOUR_FORM_ID/viewform?embedded=true' that can be easily replaced with the actual Google Forms URL. Ensure the contact information cards (email, location, office hours) remain visible and properly spaced above or alongside the embedded form. Maintain the existing luxury theme styling with deep navy backgrounds and gold accents.

requirements.summary: Update all jurisdiction-specific pages (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, Cyberabad) to use the Google Forms embedded contact form instead of the custom form
acceptanceCriteria: JurisdictionPage.tsx component renders the Google Forms embed
Each jurisdiction page displays the same Google Form with consistent styling
Jurisdiction-specific content remains visible above or alongside the form

file_operations.description: Update the JurisdictionPage component to render the modified ContactForm component with the Google Forms iframe. Pass the same googleFormsUrl prop (using the placeholder URL). Ensure the jurisdiction-specific legal services information, practice areas, and tailored content remain visible and properly positioned above the embedded form. Maintain consistent styling with the deep navy and gold luxury theme throughout the page layout.

requirements.summary: Update ServiceDetailPage to use the Google Forms embedded contact form instead of the custom ContactForm component
acceptanceCriteria: ServiceDetailPage.tsx renders the Google Forms embed
Service details and benefits remain visible above the form
Form styling is consistent with the page layout

file_operations.description: Update the ServiceDetailPage component to render the modified ContactForm component with the Google Forms iframe. Pass the googleFormsUrl prop using the same placeholder URL. Ensure service descriptions, services offered list, and benefits section remain visible above the embedded contact form. Maintain visual consistency with the luxury legal theme and ensure proper spacing between the service details and the form section.
